attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current tax system is too complicated and should be replaced by a simple percentage of all income. Everyone who has some income should be included. The person who has an income of £1000 per year should pay the same percentage as those with incomes of £1 million and above.
On this basis everyone can say that they pay the same percentage of their income towards the costs of running the country. Simple and fair?
